member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.CommentId
member.summary: Represents the unique identifier of a comment in a team project collection.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment
member.summary: A comment is a part of a discussion. When a discussion is initiated, it should have a root comment by the initiator, and other comments by the contributors.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.Id
member.summary: The Id of a comment. Id is 0 when the comment is first created and gets assigned to an incrementing value after being saved to the server.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.DiscussionId
member.summary: Id of the discussion that owns the comment.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.Discussion
member.summary: This is a client-only property to reference the discussion thread of this comment entry.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.Author
member.summary: The person who creates the comment.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.CommentType
member.summary: Indicates whether the comment is a text or a code change, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.Content
member.summary: The content of the comment.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.IsDeleted
member.summary: True if the comment is deleted.
member.remarks: When a comment is deleted, its content will be cleared. When all of its sub comments are also deleted, the comment and its sub comments will be removed from the tree.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.PublishedDate
member.summary: Time when the comment is published and can be viewed by others.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.ParentComment
member.summary: The direct parent comment of the comment.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.NeedsSave
member.summary: True if the comment has changed and can be saved to the local store.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.ChildList
member.summary: The internal list of child comments.
member.remarks: Use the ChildListLock to ensure thread-safety if this list is used in multi-threading scenarios.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.ChildListLock
member.summary: Locks to protect the list of child comments if it is potentially accessed by a different thread at the same time.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.CommentId
member.summary: The unique comment Id.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.ParentId
member.summary: The parent comment Id.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.AuthorIdentity
member.summary: The Team Foundation Id of the author.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.ClonedFrom
member.summary: References the comment which this comment is cloned from. A null value means the instance is not a cloned discussion.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.SavedDate
member.summary: The DateTime of when the comment was saved locally.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment.GetChildComments
member.summary: Returns the direct child comments of this comment. The method wraps a copy of the list of child comments in a readonly collection.

member.summary: Prunes all the sub trees whose comments are deleted, starting from this comment.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionManager.QueryOperation.QueryLocal
member.summary: Queries discussions and comments from the local storage. Returns false if the file is corrupted and cannot be loaded.
Updates the given collection of discussions with the saved discussions from the local storage.
member.param: The collection of discussions to be updated.
The discussions from the local storage.
member.returns: The map of updated discussions and their IDs.

member.summary: Updates the given collection of discussions with the saved comments from the local storage.
member.param: The map of discussions that the comments should belong to.
The comments from the local storage that are grouped by discussion.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionManager.QueryOperation.GetAuthorsForLocalComments(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment})
member.summary: Gets the TeamFoundationIdentity objects for the authors of the comments loaded from the local store.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionManager.QueryOperation.BuildCommentTrees(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread[],Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment[])
member.summary:
Builds the trees of comments and associates them to the right discussions post query. The query returns the discussions and all of their comments.
Since the discussions and comments are both sorted by DiscussionId, we iterate through the discussions and comments to match them up.
The comments also have CommentId as a second sort criteria, so when we iterate through the comments of a discussion, we know that if comments[i] is the parent of comments[j] then i must be smaller than j. Moreover, the list of child comments of a comment will be guaranteed to be ordered by the CommentId.
member.param: Discussion array sorted by DiscussionId
Comment array sorted by DiscussionId and CommentId.
member.returns: The discussions with their comment trees.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionPosition
member.summary: Position of the discussion within a file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.Id
member.summary: The unique Id of a discussion. Id is 0 when the discussion is created and gets assigned to a unique value after being saved to the server.

member.summary: Indicates the status of the discussion.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.Severity
member.summary: Indicates the severity of the discussion.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.WorkItemId
member.summary: WorkItem Id of the code review request associated with the discussion.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.ItemPath
member.summary: Server path of the file in which the discussion occurs.
member.remarks: If null, the discussion is at the code review level.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.Position
member.summary: Position within the file of the discussion.
member.remarks: If null, the discussion is at the file or code review level.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.PublishedDate
member.summary: Time when the discussion is published and can be viewed by others.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.RootComment
member.summary: The root comment of the discussion. Setter only works for the first time only, when the RootComment is null, to ensure the discussion's threaded comments cannot be updated.
member.remarks: The author of this comment is the author of the discussion.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.LastUpdatedDate
member.summary: Time when the discussion is last updated on this client. This property only gets updated when the client polls for updates.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.Revision
member.summary: Revision is incremented on the server everytime a discussion is published. However, a publish call will not update the revision of the client discussion. The client revision only gets updated when the client polls for updates.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.NeedsSave
member.summary: True if the discussion has changed and can be saved to the local store.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.ReadStatus
member.summary: Tracks whether or not the discussion has been read.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.Manager
member.summary: Keeps a reference to the DiscussionManager object

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.IsBeingPublished
member.summary: Marks the discussion as being published.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.ClonedFrom
member.summary: References the discussion which this discussion is cloned from. A null value means the instance is not a cloned discussion.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.LocalId
member.summary: The local Id of the discussion when it has not been published.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.SavedDate
member.summary: The DateTime of when the discussion was saved locally.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.AddComment(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Framework.Client.TeamFoundationIdentity,Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.CommentType,System.String,Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment)
member.summary:
Adds a new comment to this discussion.
An exception will be thrown if: 1. The parentComment is null but: a. The discussion has a root comment. b. The discussion is already deleted. 2. The parentComment has not yet been published to the server.
member.remarks: This method does not make a server trip.
member.param: Author of the new comment.
Type of the new comment.
Content of the new comment.
Parent of the new comment. If null, the new comment can be the root.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread.AddComment(Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment,Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment)
member.summary:
Adds a given comment to this discussion.
An exception will be thrown if: 1. The parentComment is null but: a. The discussion has a root comment. b. The discussion is already deleted. 2. The parentComment has not yet been published to the server.
member.remarks: This method does not make a server trip.
member.param: The comment to be added.
Parent of the given comment. If null, the new comment will be the root.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager
member.summary: Manages publishing and querying the discussions against Team Foundation Server.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.LocalDataRetentionDays
member.summary: The number of days the local data will be retained since the last saved date.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.BeginSave(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread},System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Saves the changed discussions to the local storage.
member.remarks: This method does not make a server trip. Thus, the unpublished discussions will not be published to the server.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.EndSave(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends saving the discussions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.BeginCleanup(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread},System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Cleans up the discussions in the local storage.
member.remarks: This method does not make a server trip. The discussions and comments are not changed or deleted, they are only removed from local storage.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.EndCleanup(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends cleaning up the discussions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.BeginPublish(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread},System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Publishes the discussions so other viewers can see them.
member.remarks: Publish does not sync the client objects with the server. There can be only one invocation at a time. An exception is thrown if BeginPublish is called when IsPublishing is true.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.EndPublish(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends publishing the discussions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.BeginQueryByVersion(System.Uri,Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.QueryStoreOptions,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Queries the discussions associated with the specified changeset or shelveset. The results can come from the server or the local store, or both, by setting the option, whose default value is QueryStoreOption.ServerOnly.
member.remarks:
We don't currently support QueryStoreOption.LocalOnly. To query for local discussions, you need to use QueryStoreOption.ServerAndLocal which will first query the server for the existing discussions, then update them with the locally saved ones.
Any local discussion or comment that no longer exists on the server will not be retrieved.
member.param: Specifies the stores from which the discussions are retrieved.
Can only be a uri of a changeset or a shelveset.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.EndQueryByVersion(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends querying discussions by the specified changeset or shelveset.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.BeginQueryByCodeReviewRequest(System.Int32,Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.QueryStoreOptions,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Queries the discussions associated with the specified code review request. The results can come from the server or the local store, or both, by setting the option, whose default value is QueryStoreOption.ServerOnly.
member.remarks:
We don't currently support QueryStoreOption.LocalOnly. To query for local discussions, you need to use QueryStoreOption.ServerAndLocal which will first query the server for the existing discussions, then update them with the locally saved ones.
Any local discussion or comment that no longer exists on the server will not be retrieved.
member.param: Specifies the stores from which the discussions are retrieved.
Workitem Id of the code review request.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.EndQueryByCodeReviewRequest(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Ends querying discussions by the specified code review request.

member.name: E:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.IDiscussionManager.LocalDataLost
member.summary: Notifies that the local storage is corrupted and existing data is lost.
member.remarks: This event gets raised during a save or query operation. During a save operation, the existing data is lost but the new data is stored. During a query operation, the local data will not be returned.

member.name: T:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage
member.summary: Handles read and write to the discussion local storage.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.UnpublishedDiscussionId
member.summary: The available unique local ID for the new discussions that have not been saved or published.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.Discussions
member.summary: The map of the discussions in the local storage and their IDs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.Comments
member.summary: The map of the comments in the local storage and their IDs.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.FileCorrupted
member.summary: True if the local file is corrupted and cannot be loaded.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.DiscussionManager
member.summary: The discussion manager.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.TraceKeywords
member.summary: Tracing keywords for discussion client.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.Initialize(System.Object)
member.summary: Overrides initialization before loading the table from disk.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.Load(Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle)
member.summary: Called by the base class to load the table from disk.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.Save(Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle)
member.summary: Called by the base class to save the table to disk. Only called if we return true for IsDirty.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.Store(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionThread},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment})
member.summary: Saves the discussions and comments to the local storage. This method iterates over the discussions and/or comments that need to be saved and merges them with what are currently in the local store. It does not write the changes to disk until this class is disposed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.Delete(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.CommentId})
member.summary: Deletes the discussions and comments from the local storage. This method iterates over the list of discussion and/or comment Ids and removes them from the local store content. It does not write the changes to disk until this class is disposed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.Retrieve(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Comment}@)
member.summary: Loads the discussions and comments from the local storage. This method returns the content in memory that were loaded from the local storage when this class is constructed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.DiscussionStorage.ReadDiscussion(System.Xml.XmlReader)
member.summary: Reads a discussion from the XML and stores it to the dictionary in overwrite mode.

member.summary: Reads a comment from the XML and stores it to the dictionary in overwrite mode.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The argument '{0}' is invalid..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The comment cannot be deleted because it belongs to another author. You can only delete your comments..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The comment cannot be published or saved because its content has not been set. .

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Resources.CannotPublishDiscussionWithNoRootComment
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to One of the discussions being published or saved has no root comment. A discussion must have at least one comment at the root in order to be published or saved..

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Resources.CannotUndeletePublishedComment
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The comment cannot be undeleted because it has already been published..

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Resources.CommentHasUnsupportedCharacters
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The comment contains unsupported characters..

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Resources.DiscussionIsBeingPublished
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to One of the discussions has already been being published or saved. Wait until the previous publishing or saving completes then try again..

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Resources.LocalStoreXmlValidationError
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The local storage file is invalid. Error: '{0}'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Resources.ParentCommentInDifferentDiscussion
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The comment cannot be added to the parent comment because the parent comment is in a different discussion..

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Resources.ParentCommentUnpublished
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The comment cannot be added to an unpublished comment. Publish the discussion first then retry..

member.name: P:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.Discussion.Client.Resources.PropertyCannotBeChanged
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The property '{0}' cannot be changed because the discussion or comment has been published..
